price: 103. Nul regard ne peut L’atteindre quand Lui peut atteindre tous les regards. Il est le Subtil, l’Informé.
arabic: لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lā tud'rikuhu al-abṣāru wahuwa yud'riku al-abṣāra wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
